To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Third of three Artist in Residence performances by Guy Clark from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on September 27, 2006. Special guests include: Verlon Thompson, Bryn Bright, Shawn Cam, Jamie Hartford, Emmylou Harris.

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)
